short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Force all Google tabs to dark mode

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your browsing experience with the "Google Dark Mode" Chrome extension, designed to seamlessly integrate a sleek and eye-friendly dark theme across all Google-related web pages. This user-friendly extension is perfect for those who spend considerable time on Google services, including Search, Docs, Sheets, and more, especially during late-night sessions.

Key Features:

Automatic Dark Mode: Instantly applies a dark theme to all Google web pages, reducing eye strain and enhancing visual comfort in low-light conditions.

Easy Toggle: A simple, one-click toggle in the extension popup allows you to switch between dark and light mode, giving you full control over your browsing experience.

Consistent Look: Ensures a uniform dark theme across various Google platforms for a coherent and distraction-free interface.

Lightweight and Efficient: Designed to be unobtrusive and resource-efficient, this extension won't slow down your browsing speed.

Regular Updates: Continuously updated to ensure compatibility with the latest Google page layouts and features.

Benefits:

Improved Readability: Enhanced contrast in dark mode can significantly reduce eye strain, especially during extended use.
Battery Saving: Dark mode can help conserve battery life on OLED and AMOLED screens.
Aesthetically Pleasing: A modern and stylish interface that's easy on the eyes.
Whether you're a night owl, concerned about digital eye strain, or simply prefer a darker aesthetic, the "Google Dark Mode" Chrome extension is an essential tool for a more comfortable and personalized browsing experience.
